title: Gallo-Roman remains at La Tour, Sablé-sur-Sarthe
description: The remains of a Gallo-Roman sanctuary.

properties.description: Representative location of the modern isolated dwelling known as La Tour, near the village of Sablé-sur-Sarthe, which was a locus of Gallo-Roman cult activity. Position derived from an OpenStreetMap node.
properties.title: OSM location of modern isolated dwelling La Tour
